name: part_009
file: tmp_【#冥ハロ2025】白上フブキ生誕３DLIVE「冥界Halloween Night!」【白上フブキ⧸ホロライブ】 [7Tm7dVsTPBk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Shirakami Fubuki, Fuwawa, and Mococo finish their dance pose from the previous section.
A transition animation plays with illustrations of the three performers.
Narrated intermission featuring an illustration of a fox and a skeleton.
Performance of the song 'Nekuro no Hanayome'.

subtitles.original: トリック・オア・トリート！
subtitles.english: Trick or Treat!

subtitles.original: お菓子をくれてもイタズラはしちゃうよ！
subtitles.english: Even if you give us treats, we'll still play tricks on you!

subtitles.original: 狂笑トリックスターズ / 作詞・作曲：OSTER project
subtitles.english: Kyoushou Trickstars / Lyrics, Composition: OSTER project

subtitles.original: ようこそ everyone 見の毛もよだつこの spooky night
subtitles.english: Welcome everyone to this hair-raising spooky night

subtitles.original: 腹の底まで揺れ kick & bass & hats & trumpet
subtitles.english: Shake to the core with kick & bass & hats & trumpet

subtitles.original: ランタンと swingin' beat 赤い目で踊り狂えば
subtitles.english: Lanterns and a swinging beat, if you dance like crazy with red eyes

subtitles.original: 浮世の憂いも忘れられるでしょ
subtitles.english: You'll be able to forget the sorrows of the transient world, right?

subtitles.original: 諸行無常 ちまたじゃ お化けよりも怖い人たち
subtitles.english: All things are impermanent; in the streets, people are scarier than ghosts

subtitles.original: 増えすぎちゃってすぐに 1out, 2out, 3out ノックアウト
subtitles.english: They've increased too much, so quickly it's 1out, 2out, 3out, knockout!

subtitles.original: コンプライアンスも 厳しい世の中ですが
subtitles.english: Even in this world of strict compliance

subtitles.original: 恐怖のリライト 請け負い申します
subtitles.english: We undertake the rewriting of fear

subtitles.original: Give me a cherry pie それとも may I choke you up?
subtitles.english: Give me a cherry pie, or may I choke you up?

subtitles.original: Give me a flowy dress それとも may I stab you to death?
subtitles.english: Give me a flowy dress, or may I stab you to death?

subtitles.original: Rope, box, cake, knife, scissors, razor blade
subtitles.english: Rope, box, cake, knife, scissors, razor blade

subtitles.original: Choose one... choose one... choose one...
subtitles.english: Choose one... choose one... choose one...

subtitles.original: 「さぁ選んで」
subtitles.english: “Now, choose.”

subtitles.original: なんちゃって ドッキリ大成功！
subtitles.english: Just kidding, the prank was a huge success!

subtitles.original: 響くパンパカパンパンファンファーレで
subtitles.english: With the echoing fanfare

subtitles.original: にっこり笑っちゃってはい、ポーズ！
subtitles.english: Smile and say cheese!

subtitles.original: あー怖かったなーなんて 坐り込んで涙目で
subtitles.english: Saying “Oh, that was scary,” sitting down with teary eyes

subtitles.original: 笑う顔見たいな
subtitles.english: I want to see your smiling face

subtitles.original: ちっちゃな箱の中の モンスターに怯えにゃいなら
subtitles.english: If you're not afraid of the monster in the small box

subtitles.original: いつだってここに おいで
subtitles.english: Come here anytime

subtitles.original: もっとずっと本能的で楽しくなれる
subtitles.english: You can become much more instinctive and have fun

subtitles.original: 恐怖と踊っちゃおうぜ
subtitles.english: Let's dance with fear

subtitles.original: 森羅万象 キワまでカタルシス
subtitles.english: All things in nature, catharsis to the limit

subtitles.original: もういっちょ 感情ジェットコースターで ゴキゲンデトックス
subtitles.english: One more time, a happy detox on an emotional roller coaster

subtitles.original: 満月が暴く 醜悪な本性
subtitles.english: The full moon reveals a hideous true nature

subtitles.original: デタラメに杖振り回し hocus pocus
subtitles.english: Waving a wand randomly, hocus pocus

subtitles.original: 劣等感を餌に 育つ呪いを
subtitles.english: The curse that grows by feeding on inferiority complexes

subtitles.original: 摘み取る術を知ってるかい？
subtitles.english: Do you know the way to pluck it out?

subtitles.original: 「迷える哀れな子羊たちよ」
subtitles.english: “You poor, wandering lambs”

subtitles.original: 「お菓子が欲しいかい？ それとも安らぎが欲しいかい？」
subtitles.english: “Do you want candy? Or do you want peace?”

subtitles.original: 永遠に求め続けるの？ それならばずっと苦しいままだ
subtitles.english: Will you keep seeking forever? Then you'll remain in pain forever.

subtitles.original: 恐怖からの解放によって 成し得る救済があるのならば
subtitles.english: If there is salvation that can be achieved through liberation from fear

subtitles.original: この目隠しはそのままで
subtitles.english: Keep this blindfold on

subtitles.original: 「さぁ、イタズラ完了」
subtitles.english: “Now, the trick is complete.”

subtitles.original: 永遠に断ち切れない 呪いの鎖に囚われ
subtitles.english: Trapped in a chain of curses that can never be broken

subtitles.original: 朽ち果ててしまう前に
subtitles.english: Before you rot away completely

subtitles.original: 脳みそちょっといじるだけで あら不思議
subtitles.english: Just a little tinkering with the brain, and oh, look!

subtitles.original: こんなに気持ち良くて 気分爽快
subtitles.english: It feels so good, so refreshing

subtitles.original: なんちゃって ドッキリ大成功！
subtitles.english: Just kidding, the prank was a huge success!

subtitles.original: 響くパンパカパンパンファンファーレで
subtitles.english: With the echoing fanfare

subtitles.original: にっこり笑っちゃってはい、ポーズ
subtitles.english: Smile and say cheese!

subtitles.original: あー怖かったなーなんて へたり込んで涙目で
subtitles.english: Saying “Oh, that was scary,” collapsing with teary eyes

subtitles.original: 笑う顔見たいな
subtitles.english: I want to see your smiling face

subtitles.original: もう苦しまなくていいよ こんなに頑張ったんだから
subtitles.english: You don't have to suffer anymore, because you've worked so hard

subtitles.original: 躊躇わずこっちにおいで
subtitles.english: Don't hesitate, come over here

subtitles.original: もっとずっと本能的に気持ち良いいだけの
subtitles.english: Just something that's much more instinctively pleasant

subtitles.original: ゴールを見せてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll show you the goal

subtitles.original: 脳漿埋まってまで光るカタルシス
subtitles.english: Catharsis that shines until the brain is buried

subtitles.original: もういっちょ 因果全リセットで 魂デトックス
subtitles.english: One more time, a soul detox with a full reset of karma

subtitles.original: いつかの、あったかもしれない世界の出来事までも、
subtitles.english: Even the events of a world that might have existed once,

subtitles.original: この冥界ではこうして思念として漂っているんだね。
subtitles.english: They drift as thoughts here in the underworld.

subtitles.original: あまり深入りしてはいけないよ。こういうのが一番たちが悪い。
subtitles.english: Don't delve too deeply. These things are the most troublesome.

subtitles.original: 私はただ、あなたを愛していただけ。
subtitles.english: I just... loved you.

subtitles.original: 物言わぬ唇に生気を吹き込んで
subtitles.english: Blowing life into wordless lips

subtitles.original: 今宵「あなた」は甦る あの頃の姿で
subtitles.english: Tonight, “you” shall be revived in your form from those days

subtitles.original: ネクロの花嫁 / 作詞・作曲・奏音69
subtitles.english: The Bride of Necro / Lyrics, Composition: Kanon69
